title: Subaru font
content: im looking for the SUBARU font.Does any 1 know the name and where i can find it?
author: just

comments.content:
Craig, you'll have better luck in the future if you post this kind of request in the Type Idenfication Board, and if you upload a sample.   
   
Anyway, if this is the face you're referring to,   
   
 ![subaru.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010704im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/48046.jpg)   
   
then it's an extended weight of Eurostile (or Microgramma, as it was originally called when it was first released as an all caps face in the 50s).   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/eurostile/t-black-extended/testdrive.html?s=SUBARU+MODELS+OWNERS&p=24](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023010704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/eurostile/t-black-extended/testdrive.html?s=SUBARU+MODELS+OWNERS&p=24)
